page.title: 18Children's favourite food
page.content: My favourite food is fish and chips, fried and then served with plenty of salt and vinegar. My favourite breakfast is weetabix,it has this name because it is like a biscuit of wheat,I eat it with milk and sugar. I also like my Sunday dinner,this consists of Yorkshire pudding,potatoes, stuffing,mint sauce,vegetables - often carrots - and pork. Yorkshire pudding is made from eggs,flour and milk all mixed together and then cooked in the oven. Mint sauce is made from a herb called mint which we chop up finely and put into some vinegar.Sunday dinner is superb and we all sit down together as a family which makes it even more special as an important occasion.
